resources.string: For creating folders, go to the files screen. Below the search bar, you will find a button labeled "Create Folder." Click on it, and a text box will appear asking for the name you want to give to the folder. Enter the name, and the folder will be created.

For downloading files, go to the files screen on the left sidebar. If you have any uploaded files in the application, they will appear in the list. On the right-hand side, there are two buttons. Clicking on the download button will download the file.

For deleting files, go to the files screen on the left sidebar. If you have any uploaded files in the application, they will appear in the list. On the right-hand side, there are two buttons. Clicking on the delete button will delete the file.

For deleting folders, go to the files screen. Below the search bar, you will find a button labeled "Delete Folder." Click on it, and a text box will appear asking for the name of the folder you want to delete. Enter the name, and the folder will be deleted.

Discover the efficiency of managing your emails in our application, designed to make communication intuitive and accessible. On the left sidebar, you will find a clearly identified icon with an envelope, indicating the "Mail" section. Clicking on this icon will redirect you to the email screen. The email screen is divided into two sections for effective organization. On the left side, you will find a complete list of all your emails, with a "Compose" button above. To review a specific email, simply click on the desired message, and it will open on the other part of the screen.

Accessing your account is simple. From the upper right corner of the screen, simply click on the dropdown icon to reveal a menu where you will find the option to provide your email address and password in the designated fields. Once you have entered the required information, click on the login button, and you\'re done!

Welcome to the registration of our application, your gateway to an unparalleled audiovisual experience! In the upper right corner, you will find stylish icons with a dropdown icon to change the language to English, allowing you to explore our application in the language of your preference. Additionally, you will have instant access to login through an intuitive icon.

Uploading files to our application is a simple process. First, go to the files screen by clicking on the sidebar icon on the left, then click on the button labeled "Upload File," and your file explorer will open. Select the files or folders you want to upload.
